fields.name: _id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the metadata entry (Primary Key)

fields.name: associated_id
fields.description: Identifier of the associated entity in KBdata

fields.name: description
fields.description: Detailed description of the metadata entry

fields.name: tags
fields.description: Tags for categorizing or indexing the metadata

fields.name: status
fields.description: Current status of the metadata entry

fields.name: created_by
fields.description: Identifier of the user or system that created the metadata entry

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Timestamp when the metadata was created

fields.name: updated_at
fields.description: Timestamp when the metadata was last updated
